ValidationRule.description: This VR will fire if Company, Region and Industry is not populated when changing Lead Status to Pending Prospect.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Pending Prospect'), NOT($Setup.Org_Control__c.Validation_Rule__c), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Status) ), OR(ISBLANK(Company), ISPICKVAL(Region__c, ''), ISPICKVAL(Industry, '')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: LV5: Please populate Company, Region and Industry when changing Lead Status to Pending Prospect.
